title: Bryan Cranston (Extended Cut) | Hearing We Go Again
description:
The televised hearings of the Jan 6th Committee are proving to be must-see events, in particular the moments when witnesses have been asked to comment on the drinking habits of a certain former mayor of New York City. And Bryan Cranston shares the story behind the plot of his new film, “Jerry and Marge Go Large,” in which his character puts his math skills to extremely good use. Check out “Jerry and Marge Go Large” when it premieres this Friday on Paramount+!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
